CustomField.description: Introduced in the "Advising Email Automation" module.
CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Opportunity__r.Advising_Email__c, "Intro Email" ), "Intro Email; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Opportunity__r.Advising_Email__c, "Followup Email" ), "Followup Email; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Opportunity__r.Advising_Email__c, "Final Reminder Email" ), "Final Reminder Email; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Opportunity__r.Advising_Email__c, "Auto Renewal Email" ), "Auto Renewal Email; ",null )
CustomField.label: Advising Email
